cleaned_text: Ayurvedic therapist Welcome to the podcast of yoga and lifestyle medicine Hope to find you well today Remember your diet is your 1st medicine, your lifestyle and emotions are also good keys to work with to prevent and cure yourself. Today I will talk about Hypothyroidism: Why it is happening, diet, herbs .... what we need, what we should do...
